name: Material Stylus Popup [Chrome]
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
A Material Design-esque style for Stylus Popup on Chrome. I love Stylus, don't get me wrong, but the default popup is a bit bland (some people like that and that's ok!) This is intended to make the UI look better, for those who like that kind of thing. Enjoy!
